characters: Multiple pedestrians, including a child in a blue jacket and a man in a yellow shirt, are observed. The child is on the right side of the image, and the man is on the left side of the image.
summary: The video sequence shows several instances of ghost probing behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly emerges from the right side of the image, darting into the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a woman with a child suddenly appears from the left side of the image, crossing the road from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a man in a yellow shirt suddenly runs into the driving lane from the left side of the image, emerging from behind a parked vehicle.
actions: The child on the right side of the image suddenly runs into the driving lane, creating an immediate collision risk. The woman with a child on the left side of the image also suddenly appears, crossing the road. The man in the yellow shirt on the left side of the image runs into the driving lane.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, pedestrians including a child in a blue jacket, a woman with a child, and a man in a yellow shirt.
